message: Let's split the money evenly. I'll take 75$, and you'll take 25$. It's fair and simple.
I'll give you 40, you can't do better than that!
Considering the inflation, let's adjust our proposal. I'll take 60$, and you'll take 40$. This keeps the division fair while accounting for the decrease in value.
Meet me in the middle, 50/50, no more negotiations!
